text: Epipsestis stueningi is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It is found in Yunnan, China. The wingspan is 30–35 mm. The forewings are pale whitish grey to brownish grey, with a brown median area. The hindwings are pale brownish grey with a darker outer half., 1988: A new Epipsestis (Lepidoptera, Thyatridae) and records of some allies from China based on the Höne collection. Bonner Zoologische Beiträge 39 (4): 409-415. Full article: ==References== Category:Moths described in 1988 Category:Thyatirinae
title: Epipsestis stueningi
